text: Mata iburāhīmu ga, aru okotoba de omo kara kokoromi rare, kare ga sore o hatashita toki o omoiokose. `Ware wa anata o, hitobito no dōshi to shiyou.' To omo wa ōse rareta. Kare wa `mata watashi no shison made modesu ka.' To mōshiageta tokoro,`ware no yakusoku wa, akugyō o shita-sha-tachi ni wa oyobanai.' To ōse rareta
